name: Goblin Valley
description:
You can't pick your family - you just have to deal with it. Help your goblin children get along until they become a large and prosperous community.

We didn't have a chance to participate in the 2022 GMTK game jam, so we made a jam game independently. This was the result!

All art and music original. Made with Love https://love2d.org/

Special thanks to our playtesters Maiko and Alan.
